div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2136 Leonforte, 15 km. NE of Enna, 1895 (612) Burial: 350-25 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 68 AR Rhegium: 1 tetradr. Camarina: 1 didr. Messana: 2 tetradr. Selinus: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 6 tetradr. Athens: 3 tetradr. Pegasi: 54 Disposition: dispersed Orsi's notes Jenkins, ANSCent., p. 375 No. 2139 below, Piazza Armerina, may be another reference to this hd.
